attributes.action: Display the EU Flag alongside the Union Jack (similar to other EU countries with their flag)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why do we not display the EU flag alongside the Union Jack during state occasions and on state buildings? 

Other EU countries display the EU flag proudly alongside their national flag, yet in Britain we don't. 

It's about time we honor and be proud of our position as a key member state of Europe and show the EU flag alongside our Union Jack.

This will strengthen our unity with our European neighbours and raise our world status.
